translated: That which is free of self is where there is no conceptualization having the character of passion, dispassion, or neutral passion.

original: phyag rgya dang ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pas thob par bya ba man ngag bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya dang ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pas thob par bya ba man ngag bzhi pa'o //
translated: This is the fourth esoteric instruction, to be attained by the stage of the seal and contemplation.

original: bdag med pa de nyid ni zhes pa la mngon par byang chub kyi rim pas bstan to //
analyzed: bdag med pa de nyid ni zhes pa la mngon par byang chub kyi rim pas bstan to //
translated: That very selflessness is taught by the stage of manifest enlightenment.

original: sgyu ma lta bu'i sku dang ldan pas zhes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'i sku la dmigs nas so //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i sku dang ldan pas zhes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'i sku la dmigs nas so //
translated: Since it possesses the illusory body, it is the attainment of the illusory body.

original: chos kyi sku'o zhes pa ni sngags dang phyag rgya'i rim pas thob par bya ba'i 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: chos kyi sku'o zhes pa ni sngags dang phyag rgya'i rim pas thob par bya ba'i 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: The Dharmakaya is the clearlight which is to be attained by the process of mantra and seal.

original: de las 'byung ba zhes pa ni cig car ram snang ba nye bar thob pa la sogs pa'i rim pas ye shes kyi sku bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: de las 'byung ba zhes pa ni cig car ram snang ba nye bar thob pa la sogs pa'i rim pas ye shes kyi sku bskyed pa'o //
translated: The arising from that is the generation of the Knowledge Body by the process of the instant or the attainment of the clearlight and so forth.

original: des ni bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das bstan to //
analyzed: des ni bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das bstan to //
translated: This teaches the Bhagavat as the nature of the process of the consecration of oneself.

original: chen po ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
analyzed: chen po ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
translated: The great is the conventional truth.

original: rdo rje ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
translated: The vajra is the ultimate truth.

original: chen po dang ldan pa'i rdo rje gang la yod pa de ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ni bden pa gnyis dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa'i bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das bstan to //
analyzed: chen po dang ldan pa'i rdo rje gang la yod pa de ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ni bden pa gnyis dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa'i bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das bstan to //
translated: He who has the great vajra is the Great Vajradhara. This teaches the Bhagavat as the nature of the process of union, which is characterized by the inseparability of the two truths.

original: de ltar rim pa lnga'i bdag nyid kyi bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos 'og nas 'byung ba'i tshig 'dis 'chad par 'gyur ba'i tshig bka' stsal ba ni gsungs so //
analyzed: de ltar rim pa lnga'i bdag nyid kyi bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos 'og nas 'byung ba'i tshig 'dis 'chad par 'gyur ba'i tshig bka' stsal ba ni gsungs so //
translated: Thus, the Blessed One, Great Vajradhara, whose nature is the five stages, with the following words, spoke the words that will be explained.

original: sdud pa po'i tshig go zhes pa ni lag na rdo rje'i'o //
analyzed: sdud pa po'i tshig go zhes pa ni lag na rdo rje'i'o //
translated: The words of the compiler are those of VajrapƒÅ·πái.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bsgom pa ste zhes pa ni rnal 'byor gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis so zhes tshig lhag ma'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bsgom pa ste zhes pa ni rnal 'byor gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis so zhes tshig lhag ma'o //
translated: The meditation of Great Vajradhara is by the yoga samƒÅdhi, the remainder of the words.

original: de yongs su gyur pas rdo rje thogs med de zhes pa ni lhag ma rnal 'byor gsum gyis so //
analyzed: de yongs su gyur pas rdo rje thogs med de zhes pa ni lhag ma rnal 'byor gsum gyis so //
translated: That completely transforms into Vajra A·πÖku≈õa is the remainder of the three yogas.

original: dkyil 'khor thams cad bsgom par bya //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor thams cad bsgom par bya //
translated: Meditate on all ma·πá·∏çalas.

original: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog gi ting nge 'dzin gyis mi bskyod pa la sogs pa spro bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog gi ting nge 'dzin gyis mi bskyod pa la sogs pa spro bar bya'o //
translated: Meditate on Ak·π£obhya and so on by the ma·πá·∏çalƒÅgrya samƒÅdhi.

original: sems can thams cad de nyid du gnas pa zhes pa ni /
analyzed: sems can thams cad de nyid du gnas pa zhes pa ni /
translated: All sentient beings abide in suchness.

original: rdo rje'i tshig gi don sngar bshad pa'i chos thams cad bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid so sor ston pa'i tshig gi tshogs kyi brjod par bya ba la gnas pa /
analyzed: rdo rje'i tshig gi don sngar bshad pa'i chos thams cad bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid so sor ston pa'i tshig gi tshogs kyi brjod par bya ba la gnas pa /
translated: The meaning of the vajra verse is that the subject matter of the collection of words that individually teach the characteristic of the selflessness of all phenomena, as previously explained,

original: sems can thams cad zhugs pa'i yongs su gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor pa rnams chos thams cad bdag med par smra ba la bstan par gnas pa zhes pa ni bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad zhugs pa'i yongs su gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor pa rnams chos thams cad bdag med par smra ba la bstan par gnas pa zhes pa ni bsam par bya'o //
translated: is the mandala of the transformation of all sentient beings abiding in the teaching of the selflessness of all phenomena.

original: chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu yin pas zhes pa ni gtan tshig yin no //
analyzed: chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu yin pas zhes pa ni gtan tshig yin no //
translated: All phenomena are like illusions is the reason.

original: chos thams cad brdzun pa zhes pa ni dam bca' ba'o //üîΩnye bar mtshon pa tsam yin te chos thams cad stong pa yin te /
analyzed: chos thams cad brdzun pa zhes pa ni dam bca' ba'o // nye bar mtshon pa tsam yin te chos thams cad stong pa yin te /
translated: All phenomena are false is the thesis.

original: rang bzhin med pa'i @9a * //
analyzed: rang bzhin med pa'i @9a * //
translated: This is merely an illustration. All phenomena are empty because they are essenceless.

original: phyir ro // chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa yin te dbang phyug la sogs pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyir ro // chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa yin te dbang phyug la sogs pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: All phenomena are signless because they are not caused by ƒ™≈õvara, and so on.

original: chos thams cad smon pa med pa ste rtog pa las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad smon pa med pa ste rtog pa las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
translated: All phenomena are wishless because they transcend thought.

original: de bzhin du chos sgrogs bzhi ni 'dus byas pa thams cad mi rtag pa ste byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du chos sgrogs bzhi ni 'dus byas pa thams cad mi rtag pa ste byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Likewise, the four proclamations of Dharma are: All that is compounded is impermanent, because it is produced.

original: 'dus byas thams cad skad cig ma yin te byas pa'i phyir dang / yod pa'i phyir dang / rkyen gyi dbye bas phye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dus byas thams cad skad cig ma yin te byas pa'i phyir dang / yod pa'i phyir dang / rkyen gyi dbye bas phye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: All that is compounded is momentary, because it is produced, because it exists, and because it is differentiated by the differentiation of conditions.

original: chos thams cad bdag med pa ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad bdag med pa ste /
translated: All dharmas are without self,

original: dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bdag mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bdag mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because a self that possesses the characteristics of an objective referent is not perceived.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba ste /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba ste /
translated: Nirvana is peace,

original: 'dus ma byas pa dang rang rig pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas pa dang rang rig pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is uncompounded and because it is self-cognizant.

original: de las gzhan pa brdzun pa'i tshig gis ni rdo rje'i tshig ces bya'o //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa brdzun pa'i tshig gis ni rdo rje'i tshig ces bya'o //
translated: The other words that are not like that are called vajra words.

original: yid kyi bya ba'i 'og tu ngag gi bya ba bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: yid kyi bya ba'i 'og tu ngag gi bya ba bshad par bya ste /
translated: After the mental activities, the verbal activities should be explained.

original: rgyal ba ni dkyil 'khor pa rnams so //
analyzed: rgyal ba ni dkyil 'khor pa rnams so //
translated: The Victor is the ma·πá·∏çala deities.

original: sems can thams cad de shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i phyogs la dmigs nas so //
analyzed: sems can thams cad de shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i phyogs la dmigs nas so //
translated: All sentient beings are known in terms of the objective reference to the side of natural purity.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yin pa'i phyir zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yin pa'i phyir zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the essence of the Tathagata means because it is the nature of all the Tathagatas.

original: rgyal ba yang yin la zhes pa ni las 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: rgyal ba yang yin la zhes pa ni las 'dzin pa'o //
translated: And the Victor means the one who holds the karma.

original: de dag ni khams gsum pa la gnas pa'i sems can thams cad dkyil 'khor ba la bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: de dag ni khams gsum pa la gnas pa'i sems can thams cad dkyil 'khor ba la bsdus pa'o //
translated: These are all the sentient beings who dwell in the three realms, included in the mandala.

original: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir sems can thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa bstan to ;
analyzed: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir sems can thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa bstan to ;
translated: In order to demonstrate just that, he teaches, all sentient beings, etc.

original: / chos thams cad ni phung po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: / chos thams cad ni phung po la sogs pa'o //
translated: All phenomena are the aggregates, etc.

original: slu ba po ni brdzun pa ste stong pa'o //
analyzed: slu ba po ni brdzun pa ste stong pa'o //
translated: The deceiver is the false, the empty.

original: sgyu ma lta bu'i ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i ngo bo nyid //
translated: The nature of illusion

original: ces pa ni dri za'i grong khyer la sogs pa bzhin du so sor snang ba yang bden pa ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: ces pa ni dri za'i grong khyer la sogs pa bzhin du so sor snang ba yang bden pa ma yin pa ste /
translated: means that the individual appearances, like the city of the gandharvas, etc., are not true.

original: rten cing 'brel ba las 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rten cing 'brel ba las 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they arise in dependence.

original: rten nas 'byung ba ma byung ba //
analyzed: rten nas 'byung ba ma byung ba //
translated: The non-arisen dependent origination

original: de nyid rig pa mchog gis gsungs /
analyzed: de nyid rig pa mchog gis gsungs /
translated: is taught by the best of the knowers of reality.

original: rtog pa med cing dmigs pa med //
analyzed: rtog pa med cing dmigs pa med //
translated: Without thought, without reference,

original: dgod pa med cing gnas med pa //
analyzed: dgod pa med cing gnas med pa //
translated: It has no laughter, no abode.

original: ma rig sa bon las byung ba'i //
analyzed: ma rig sa bon las byung ba'i //
translated: It arises from the seed of ignorance.

original: thog ma tha ma bar ma med //
analyzed: thog ma tha ma bar ma med //
translated: It has no beginning, middle, or end.

original: chu shing lta bur snying po med //
analyzed: chu shing lta bur snying po med //
translated: It is without essence, like a plantain tree.

original: dri za'i grong khyer dang mtshungs pa //
analyzed: dri za'i grong khyer dang mtshungs pa //
translated: It is like a city of the gandharvas.

original: rmongs par byed cing ma rungs pa'i //üîΩ'gro ba sgyu ma bzhin du snang //
analyzed: rmongs par byed cing ma rungs pa'i // 'gro ba sgyu ma bzhin du snang //
translated: It is a delusion, a horror.

original: zhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: The world appears like an illusion.

original: byang chub sems kyi rnam 'grel las kyang //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi rnam 'grel las kyang //
translated: And the Bodhicittavivara·πáa says:

original: gzugs ni dbu ba dang mtshungs la //
analyzed: gzugs ni dbu ba dang mtshungs la //
translated: Form is like foam,

original: tshor ba chu bur 'dra ba yin //
analyzed: tshor ba chu bur 'dra ba yin //
translated: Feeling is like a bubble,

original: 'du shes smig rgyu dang 'dra ba'i //
analyzed: 'du shes smig rgyu dang 'dra ba'i //
translated: Perception is like a mirage,

original: chu shing dang mtshungs 'du byed rnams //
analyzed: chu shing dang mtshungs 'du byed rnams //
translated: Formations are like a plantain tree,

original: rnam par shes pa sgyu ma bzhin //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa sgyu ma bzhin //
translated: Consciousness is like an illusion.

original: de ltar phung po rnams @9b bstan pa'o //üîΩzhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de ltar phung po rnams @9b bstan pa'o // zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: Thus the aggregates are taught.

original: de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du /
translated: And:

original: rang las ma yin gzhan las min //
analyzed: rang las ma yin gzhan las min //
translated: Not from itself, not from another,

original: gnyi ga las min rgyu med min //
analyzed: gnyi ga las min rgyu med min //
translated: Not from both, not without cause,

original: dngos po gang dang gang du yang //üîΩskye ba nam yang 'thad pa min //
analyzed: dngos po gang dang gang du yang // skye ba nam yang 'thad pa min //
translated: In no place and in no way

original: zhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: Is there ever any arising.

original: tshig brjod pa ni rang bzhin med pa ston par byed pa'i tshig brjod pa /
analyzed: tshig brjod pa ni rang bzhin med pa ston par byed pa'i tshig brjod pa /
translated: The expression is the expression of the teaching of essencelessness.

original: bsgom pa ni bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: bsgom pa ni bsam par bya'o //
translated: The meditation is the contemplation.

original: de yang zhes bya ba la sogs pas lha'i dbang pos yongs su zhus pa las lung tshad ma nyid du bstan te /
analyzed: de yang zhes bya ba la sogs pas lha'i dbang pos yongs su zhus pa las lung tshad ma nyid du bstan te /
translated: And that and so forth indicate that the request of the lord of gods teaches the validity of scripture.

original: lha'i bu zhes pa ni kye brgya byin chos thams cad ni phung po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: lha'i bu zhes pa ni kye brgya byin chos thams cad ni phung po la sogs pa'o //
translated: The son of gods is Indra. O Indra, all phenomena are the aggregates and so forth.

original: brdzun pa ni ngo bo med pa'o //üîΩsgyu ma ni med pa yang 'khrul ba'i dbang gis snang ba ste /
analyzed: brdzun pa ni ngo bo med pa'o // sgyu ma ni med pa yang 'khrul ba'i dbang gis snang ba ste /
translated: False means essenceless.üîΩAn illusion is a nonexistent that appears due to the power of delusion, like a mirage.

original: brtags pa'i phyir dri za'i grong khyer bzhin no //
analyzed: brtags pa'i phyir dri za'i grong khyer bzhin no //
translated: It is imagined.

original: da yang de bzhin du ston par byed pa zhes pa ni ngas kyang sgyu ma lta bu nyid kyis chos ston pa ste /
analyzed: da yang de bzhin du ston par byed pa zhes pa ni ngas kyang sgyu ma lta bu nyid kyis chos ston pa ste /
translated: And now, I also teach in that way means that I also teach phenomena as illusionlike.

original: rang mthong lam ston skyob pa yin //üîΩzhes 'byung bas so //üîΩdes na / da ni brdzun du smra ba'o //
analyzed: rang mthong lam ston skyob pa yin // zhes 'byung bas so // des na / da ni brdzun du smra ba'o //
translated: I am the one who sees the path, teaches it, and protects it.

original: zhes pa ni dngos po thams cad bdag med par smra ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni dngos po thams cad bdag med par smra ba'o //
translated: Therefore, Now I am a liar means that I teach that all things are selfless.

original: tshig don tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das la brdzun smra ba'i skyon du thal bar mi 'gyur te nges pa'i tshig bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshig don tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das la brdzun smra ba'i skyon du thal bar mi 'gyur te nges pa'i tshig bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The Blessed One is not implicated in the fault of lying by the mere words and their meanings, because he taught the definitive words.

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis nga ni yi dags yin no zhes ston pas de la bcom ldan 'das la yi dags nyid du thal bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis nga ni yi dags yin no zhes ston pas de la bcom ldan 'das la yi dags nyid du thal bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: Thus, the Blessed One is not implicated in the fault of being a hungry ghost by the words I am a hungry ghost, because

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: he is the one who

original: sdig pa thams cad 'joms mdzad pa //
analyzed: sdig pa thams cad 'joms mdzad pa //
translated: destroys all evil,

original: srid pa'i rgya mtsho las grol phyir //
analyzed: srid pa'i rgya mtsho las grol phyir //
translated: and liberates from the ocean of existence.

original: des na nga ni yi dags te //
analyzed: des na nga ni yi dags te //
translated: Therefore, I am a hungry ghost,

original: ngan song las skyes ma yin no //üîΩzhes bya ba la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: ngan song las skyes ma yin no // zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: but not born from the lower realms.

original: 'di ni zhes pa la sogs pas phan yon bstan te /
analyzed: 'di ni zhes pa la sogs pas phan yon bstan te /
translated: The benefits are taught by this, etc.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo bo rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo bo rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so //
translated: The words of all the tathagatas means that it was spoken by Great Vajradhara, the essence of all the tathagatas.üîΩ The words like space means

original: gsung ni nam mkha' dang 'dra bar //
analyzed: gsung ni nam mkha' dang 'dra bar //
translated: that the words are like space,üîΩand the meaning is also like space.

original: zhes pa ni gsung yang yin la nam mkha' dang 'dra ba gang yin pa ste las 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni gsung yang yin la nam mkha' dang 'dra ba gang yin pa ste las 'dzin pa'o //
translated: This is speech and also what is like space, that is, the holding of karma.

original: dngos po med pas zhes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'i chos ston pa'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pas so //
analyzed: dngos po med pas zhes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'i chos ston pa'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pas so //
translated: By the absence of entity, he holds the characteristic of teaching the Dharma that is like an illusion.

original: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes las //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes las //
translated: From nondual intuition,üîΩhe is in the reality of emptiness.

original: zhes pa ni stong pa nyid kyi de kho na nyid la'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni stong pa nyid kyi de kho na nyid la'o //
translated: By the faith of the mind, he is in the faith of the mind.

original: lhag par mos pa zhes pa ni 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: lhag par mos pa zhes pa ni 'dod pa'o //
translated: By the faith of the mind, he is in the faith of the mind.üîΩBy the faith of the mind, he is in the faith of the mind.üîΩBy the faith of the mind, he is in the faith of the mind.üîΩBy the faith of the mind, he is in the faith of the mind.üîΩBy the faith of the mind, he is in the faith of the mind.

original: des ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi sngar bshad pa'i ting nge 'dzin bstan to //
analyzed: des ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi sngar bshad pa'i ting nge 'dzin bstan to //
translated: By the faith of the mind, he is in the faith of the mind.

original: slob bzhin pa'i zhes pa ni slob par byed pa ste las dang po pa rnams kyi'o //üîΩrang gi dam tshig ces pa ni don yod grub pa'i rigs kyi sdom pas so //üîΩ'gugs pa ni sgyu ma lta bu @10a * //
analyzed: slob bzhin pa'i zhes pa ni slob par byed pa ste las dang po pa rnams kyi'o // rang gi dam tshig ces pa ni don yod grub pa'i rigs kyi sdom pas so // 'gugs pa ni sgyu ma lta bu @10a * //
translated: By the faith of the mind, he is in the faith of the mind.üîΩBy the faith of the mind, he is in the faith of the mind.üîΩBy the faith of the mind, he is in the faith of the mind.

original: bstan pas gdul bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: bstan pas gdul bar bya ba'o //
translated: By the faith of the mind, he is in the faith of the mind.üîΩBy the faith of the mind, he is in the faith of the mind.üîΩBy the faith of the mind, he is in the faith of the mind.üîΩBy the faith of the mind, he is in the faith of the mind.üîΩBy the faith of the mind, he is in the faith of the mind.üîΩBy the faith of the mind, he is in the faith of the mind.üîΩBy the faith of the mind, he is in the faith of the mind.üîΩBy the faith of the mind, he is in the faith of the mind.üîΩBy the faith of the mind, he is in the faith of the mind.üîΩBy the faith of the mind, he is in the faith of the mind.üîΩBy the faith of the mind, he is in the faith of the mind.üîΩBy the faith of the mind, he is in the faith of the mind.üîΩBy the faith of the mind, he is in the faith of the mind.üîΩBy the faith of the mind, he is in the faith of the mind.üîΩBy the faith of the mind, he is in the faith of the mind.

original: ji lta ba'i dam tshig go zhes pa ni de kho na nyid dang ldan pa'i sdom pa'o //
analyzed: ji lta ba'i dam tshig go zhes pa ni de kho na nyid dang ldan pa'i sdom pa'o //
translated: By the faith of the mind, he is in the faith of the mind.üîΩBy the faith of the mind, he is in the faith of the mind

original: ji lta ba bzhin du zhes pa ni sems rtse gcig pas so //
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin du zhes pa ni sems rtse gcig pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúJust as it is‚Äù means with one-pointed mind.

original: yang nas yang du bslab par bya ba ste zhes pa ni las dang po bas rgyun ma chad pas bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: yang nas yang du bslab par bya ba ste zhes pa ni las dang po bas rgyun ma chad pas bslab par bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOne should train again and again‚Äù means that a beginner should train without interruption.

original: gzhan rnams bde bar bya phyir zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang thob pa'i mtshan nyid kyis bde ba'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: gzhan rnams bde bar bya phyir zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang thob pa'i mtshan nyid kyis bde ba'i rgyu'o //

original: brdzun smra ba ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyi chos thams cad smra ba ste brjod par bya'o //üîΩde bzhin spyod pa bde ba'i rgyu //
analyzed: brdzun smra ba ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyi chos thams cad smra ba ste brjod par bya'o // de bzhin spyod pa bde ba'i rgyu //
translated: ‚ÄúLying‚Äù means to speak, to express, all phenomena that have the nature of illusion.

original: zhes pa ni bde bar phyir spyod pa gang yin pa de'i don du brdzun smra ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni bde bar phyir spyod pa gang yin pa de'i don du brdzun smra ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúLikewise, conduct is the cause of happiness‚Äù means that lying is for the sake of that conduct which is happy.

original: dper na spros pa med pa dang shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa /
analyzed: dper na spros pa med pa dang shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa /
translated: For example, a yogin who possesses unelaborate and very unelaborate conduct

original: smyon pa'i brtul zhugs dang ldan pas da ni mu stegs pa yin pa dang tshogs kyi bdag po dang ldan pa da yin pa dang smyon pa da yin no zhes brdzun pa'i tshig smra ste sbas nas rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: smyon pa'i brtul zhugs dang ldan pas da ni mu stegs pa yin pa dang tshogs kyi bdag po dang ldan pa da yin pa dang smyon pa da yin no zhes brdzun pa'i tshig smra ste sbas nas rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang thob pa'i phyir ro //

original: smyon pa'i brtul zhugs la brten te //
analyzed: smyon pa'i brtul zhugs la brten te //
translated: In dependence on the conduct of a madman,

original: phun sum tshogs pa 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: phun sum tshogs pa 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: one will accomplish the highest good.

original: zhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du /
translated: And likewise,

original: dkon mchog gsum la phan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la phan pa'i phyir //
translated: in order to benefit the Three Jewels,

original: zhes pa ni dkon mchog gsum ni sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la phan gdags par bya ba'i phyir brdzun smra bar bya ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni dkon mchog gsum ni sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la phan gdags par bya ba'i phyir brdzun smra bar bya ste /

analyzed: dper na mtshams med pa byed pa dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa la 'jug pa brdzun du smra ba'i tshig gis slu bar bya ste /

original: des de la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des de la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it benefits the Three Jewels.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dis rin chen 'byung ldan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis tshig rtsub mo'i sgo nas 'gro ba'i don bya ba'i dam tshig bshad par bya ste /

original: bcom ldan 'das de nyid ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'o //

translated: The BhagavƒÅn is glorious Vajrasattva.üîΩBecause he is the gathering of the vajras of body, etc.

translated: The BhagavƒÅn, the Great Vajradhara, who is of the nature of the single-natured clear light, dissolves into the body vajra, etc., and arises from that.

analyzed: tha dad par byas pa zhes pa ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa bzhi dang rdo rje 'chang 'di yin no zhes bya ba'o //

original: de med pas na mi phyed pa de nyid do //
analyzed: de med pas na mi phyed pa de nyid do //

analyzed: rtog pa rnam par bral ba ni //

original: zung du 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: zung du 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid do //

analyzed: dus gsum du bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes pa ni 'das pa la sogs pa'i dus la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //

original: bskyed pa'i gnas yin zhes pa ni 'od gsal ba'i bdag nyid can rdo rje 'chang chen po las grub pa 'dzin pa dang 'grub pa dang 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ngo //

analyzed: dngos grub phyag rgya che bdag nyid //

analyzed: zhes 'byung ngo //

analyzed: de nas rdo rje mi phyed pa gsum yang zhes pa'i las 'dzin pa'o //

analyzed: rdo rje 'chang nyid do zhes pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: mi phyed pas ni rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs dang / bdud bzhi pos mi phyed pa'i phyir ro /

analyzed: des mchog tu ston par mdzad pas na zhes pa ni sems can thams cad la dmigs par mdzad pa'o //

analyzed: don bshad zin pa zhes pa ni gong du bshad pa'o //

analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i phyag rgya chen po ste zhes pa ni chos 'byung gi nang na dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor de las skyes pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: de yongs su gyur pa las zhes pa ni rnal 'byor gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi 'og tu'o //

original: dkon mchog dpal du rnam par bsgom //

original: zhes pa ni rnal 'byor gsum gyis rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rnal 'byor gsum gyis rdzogs pa'o //

original: gzugs rnams kun gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog gi ting nge 'dzin gyis dkyil 'khor ba rnams spro par bstan to //
analyzed: gzugs rnams kun gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog gi ting nge 'dzin gyis dkyil 'khor ba rnams spro par bstan to //

analyzed: spro bar bya'i zhes pa ni gnas ji lta ba bzhin du dgod par bya'o //

original: brtse ba med pa zhes pa ni dper na //
analyzed: brtse ba med pa zhes pa ni dper na //

original: 'di ni dmyal ba'i chu yin te //
analyzed: 'di ni dmyal ba'i chu yin te //

analyzed: dam tshig 'das pas sreg par byed //

analyzed: dam tshig bsrung bas 'grub pa ni //

analyzed: rdo rje bdud rtsi chu 'dis 'grub //

original: de bzhin du dka' ba ma 'das pas dus byas nas dmyal bar ltur  bar 'gyur ro zhes pa la sogs pa rtsub mo yin yang rtsub mo'i tshig ma yin te /

original: phan 'dogs pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa'i phyir me 'bar ba'i khang ba las stong pa'i @11a * //
analyzed: phan 'dogs pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa'i phyir me 'bar ba'i khang ba las stong pa'i @11a * //

original: de la sogs pa tshig ces pa la sogs pa ni chags pas rol pa'i rol pa rgya che ba'i tshig dang 'khyal pa'i tshig dang de bzhin du de kho na nyid mtshon pa ngag gi brda'i rang bzhin dang phra ba'i tshig gis 'gro ba 'dul ba la spyad
analyzed: de la sogs pa tshig ces pa la sogs pa ni chags pas rol pa'i rol pa rgya che ba'i tshig dang 'khyal pa'i tshig dang de bzhin du de kho na nyid mtshon pa ngag gi brda'i rang bzhin dang phra ba'i tshig gis 'gro ba 'dul ba la spyad
translated: The words and so on in and so on of words and so forth refer to words of extensive play of passion, words of idle chatter, and likewise words of the nature of the symbolic speech that illustrates reality, and words of the subtle, which are to be employed in training beings.

original: par bya'o // de nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: par bya'o // de nyid bstan pa'i phyir /

original: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro zhes pa ni rtsub mo'i tshig gtso bor gyur pa dang tshig dang sdom pa la sogs pa bstan pas yang dag pa'i lam la bzhag ste /

analyzed: rim gyis rim pa gnyis kyi bsgom pas ston par byed pa dang / slob ma dag kyang phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ste /

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje bkod pa zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nye bar sdud pa'i mtshan nyid dpal rdo rje 'chang zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje bkod pa zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nye bar sdud pa'i mtshan nyid dpal rdo rje 'chang zhes bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: dgongs pa'i chos gcig pu zhes pa ni sbas par bshad pas don zab pa'i tshig go //

analyzed: dam tshig ni sngar bshad pa lnga po'o //

original: de nyid don ni nges pa'i don te spas pa'i don gsungs pa ni de rjod par byed pa'i tshig bka' stsal to zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: de nyid don ni nges pa'i don te spas pa'i don gsungs pa ni de rjod par byed pa'i tshig bka' stsal to zhes sbyar ro //

analyzed: lag na rdo rje ni byang chub sems dpa' dpal rdo rje 'chang la 'di skad ces gsol te zhus so //

analyzed: de bzhin du dngos gcig ba zhes pa ni stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no //

analyzed: dus gsum byung ba'i sangs rgyas zhes pa ni dus gsum la bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das rnams so //
translated: The buddhas of the three times means the BhagavƒÅns abiding in the three times.

original: chos sku gcig pu las 'khrungs pa //
analyzed: chos sku gcig pu las 'khrungs pa //
translated: Born from the single dharmakƒÅya,

original: zhes pa ni de rnams chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin yang yin la /

translated: This is because they are the nature of the Dharma Body.

analyzed: de ni zhes pa la sogs pas des phye mar btags pas thugs kyi dngos grub ni mi bskyod pa'i go 'phang ji ltar thob bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de nyid spros pas bshad par bya ste /
translated: That itself is to be explained by elaboration.

original: 'das pa ni 'od srungs la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'das pa ni 'od srungs la sogs pa'o //

original: ston pa ni bcom ldan 'das gdams ngag mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: ston pa ni bcom ldan 'das gdams ngag mdzad pa'o //
translated: The teacher is the BhagavƒÅn, the one who gives the instruction.

original: da ltar ni sh'akya thub pa la sogs pa rjes su ston par mdzad pa ni 'gro ba la phan 'dogs par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: da ltar ni sh'akya thub pa la sogs pa rjes su ston par mdzad pa ni 'gro ba la phan 'dogs par mdzad pa'o //
translated: Now, those who are teaching, such as Shakyamuni, are those who are acting to benefit migrating beings.

original: mnyes bya zhes pa ni bsnyen bkur bya ba ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas ni byams pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mnyes bya zhes pa ni bsnyen bkur bya ba ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas ni byams pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Those who are to be pleased are those who are to be served. The future Buddhas are Maitreya and so forth.

original: chos bstan pa'i sgo nas /
analyzed: chos bstan pa'i sgo nas /
translated: By means of teaching the Dharma,

original: rdzogs pa'i byang chub rtsol ba bo //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i byang chub rtsol ba bo //
translated: they strive for perfect enlightenment.

original: zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob par mdzad pa gang yin pa de rnams mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin gyi thugs kyi rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ji ltar gsod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob par mdzad pa gang yin pa de rnams mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin gyi thugs kyi rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ji ltar gsod par 'gyur te /
translated: Those who have attained the state of Great Vajradhara, by means of the samadhi of the mind vajra, which is the nature of Akshobhya, how will they be killed?

original: mtshams med pa'i sdig par thal bar 'gyur bas so //
analyzed: mtshams med pa'i sdig par thal bar 'gyur bas so //
translated: Because it would follow that they would have the sin of a heinous crime.

original: de nyid sna tshogs don ni drang ba'i don yin nam yang na ldan tshig ces pa ni nges pa'i don yin nam zhes de rnams kyis ni zhes pa la /
analyzed: de nyid sna tshogs don ni drang ba'i don yin nam yang na ldan tshig ces pa ni nges pa'i don yin nam zhes de rnams kyis ni zhes pa la /
translated: Is that very thing of various meanings the interpretable meaning, or is the word ‚Äúalso‚Äù the definitive meaning?

original: ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyis ji ltar rtogs pa ni shes par 'gyur ro //üîΩde bas na gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pas ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams rjes su gzung bar bya ba'i phyir dam tshig gi tshig de kho na nyid gsungs shig / gang yongs su shes pas byang chub sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pas rnam par mi rtog
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyis ji ltar rtogs pa ni shes par 'gyur ro // de bas na gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pas ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams rjes su gzung bar bya ba'i phyir dam tshig gi tshig de kho na nyid gsungs shig / gang yongs su shes pas byang chub sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pas rnam par mi rtog
translated: How future sentient beings will understand is to be understood.üîΩTherefore, with ‚ÄúTherefore, whoever‚Ä¶‚Äù and so forth, in order to take care of future sentient beings, the words of the commitment are stated.

original: pa'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur ro zhes bstan to //üîΩde nas zhes pa la sogs pas lag na rdo rje'i tshig gsan pa'i 'og tu 'dri ba mchog yin pas legs pa gsum de la byin nas bdag la gsol ba 'debs pa gang yin pa de ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu bshad par bgyi zhes bcom ldan
analyzed: pa'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur ro zhes bstan to // de nas zhes pa la sogs pas lag na rdo rje'i tshig gsan pa'i 'og tu 'dri ba mchog yin pas legs pa gsum de la byin nas bdag la gsol ba 'debs pa gang yin pa de ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu bshad par bgyi zhes bcom ldan
translated: The reality of that is taught, by knowing which the Bodhisattva yogi/nis will attain the stage of non-conceptuality.

original: 'das kyis bka' stsal to //
analyzed: 'das kyis bka' stsal to //
translated: Then, after hearing the words of Vajrapani, the Bhagavan, because of the question being supreme, gave him the three excellences and said, ‚ÄúI will explain just as you have requested.‚Äù

original: mi bskyod 'di la gang bshad pa de ni sbrul pa ste /
analyzed: mi bskyod 'di la gang bshad pa de ni sbrul pa ste /
translated: Here, what is explained is an emanation.

original: de ni ye shes kyi sku'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de ni ye shes kyi sku'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This is the meaning of the term ‚Äúcharacter of the exalted-knowledge body.‚Äù

original: de nyid sgyu ma lta bu nyid du mthong bas mi phyed pas rdo rjer 'gyur zhes bstan to //
analyzed: de nyid sgyu ma lta bu nyid du mthong bas mi phyed pas rdo rjer 'gyur zhes bstan to //
translated: Since it is seen as illusion-like and is indivisible, it is a vajra.

original: ma rig pa ni snang ba nye bar thob pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: ma rig pa ni snang ba nye bar thob pa'i ye shes so //
translated: Ignorance is the exalted-knowledge that is about to attain appearance.

original: de nyid 'od gsal ba'i 'bras bu nye @12a * //
analyzed: de nyid 'od gsal ba'i 'bras bu nye @12a * //
translated: Since it is the cause of the result, clear light,

original: bar len par byed pas na lag pa dang 'dra bas lag pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: bar len par byed pas na lag pa dang 'dra bas lag pa zhes bya'o //
translated: it is like a hand, and so is called a ‚Äúhand.‚Äù

original: des ni snang ba nye bar thob pa'i ye shes kyi yul du 'od gsal ba mngon du byed pa gang yin pa de ni rdo rje zhes bya'o //
analyzed: des ni snang ba nye bar thob pa'i ye shes kyi yul du 'od gsal ba mngon du byed pa gang yin pa de ni rdo rje zhes bya'o //
translated: The vajra is that which actualizes clear light as the object of the exalted-knowledge that is about to attain appearance.

original: rim pa gnyis pa thob par bya ba'i 'od gsal ba'i de kho na nyid de las ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi sku ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin gyi 'od zer lnga ni 'gyur ba spro bar bya'o //
analyzed: rim pa gnyis pa thob par bya ba'i 'od gsal ba'i de kho na nyid de las ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi sku ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin gyi 'od zer lnga ni 'gyur ba spro bar bya'o //
translated: From that clear light, which is to be attained by the second stage, the body that is the nature of exalted-knowledge should be emanated as the five light-rays that are the nature of the five Ones-Gone-Thus.

original: de nas sgyu ma yang rtog pa dang bcas pas spang bar bya ba yin te /
analyzed: de nas sgyu ma yang rtog pa dang bcas pas spang bar bya ba yin te /
translated: Then, since even the illusion is to be abandoned as having conceptuality,

original: cig car du bskyed pa'i phung po la sogs pa sangs rgyas ni bdag nyid kyi lus dang 'brel ba can gzugs la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: cig car du bskyed pa'i phung po la sogs pa sangs rgyas ni bdag nyid kyi lus dang 'brel ba can gzugs la sogs pa'o //
translated: The aggregates, etc. , generated simultaneously are the Buddha, and the body, etc. , related to the self are form, etc.

original: rdo rje gsum skyes dus gsum shes //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum skyes dus gsum shes //
translated: Born of the three vajras, he knows the three times.

original: zhes pa ni sku la sogs pa'i bdag nyid de rnams kyang sku'i rdo rje ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pas thob par bya ba 'od gsal ba'i rdo rjes sgyu ma'i lus tha mal pa'i phung po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa yang mi snang
analyzed: zhes pa ni sku la sogs pa'i bdag nyid de rnams kyang sku'i rdo rje ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pas thob par bya ba 'od gsal ba'i rdo rjes sgyu ma'i lus tha mal pa'i phung po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa yang mi snang
translated: The body, etc. , of that nature are the vajra of body, etc. , and those are to be attained by the stage of manifest enlightenment, by the vajra of clear light. The illusory body, not of the nature of the ordinary aggregates, etc. , should be made to disappear.

original: bar bya'o // de ni zhe sdang rigs zhes pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rang bzhin spong bar byed pa'i rim pa bzhi pa la'o //
analyzed: bar bya'o // de ni zhe sdang rigs zhes pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rang bzhin spong bar byed pa'i rim pa bzhi pa la'o //
translated: That is the family of wrath, in the fourth stage, which abandons the nature of passion, etc.

original: mi bskyod rdo rje'i ye shes zhes pa ni man ngag bzhi pa las byung ba'i 'od gsal ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mi bskyod rdo rje'i ye shes zhes pa ni man ngag bzhi pa las byung ba'i 'od gsal ba zhes bya'o //
translated: The intuition of Akshobhya-vajra is called clear light, which arises from the fourth esoteric instruction.

original: de'i shes pa la sogs pas 'gro ba'i don bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i shes pa la sogs pas 'gro ba'i don bya ba'i phyir /
translated: By the intuition of that, etc. , he performs the welfare of the world.

original: zhing ni man ngag bzhi pa la dmigs nas dngos grub chen po ni rdo rje 'chang chen po phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs skye ba ni de las 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: zhing ni man ngag bzhi pa la dmigs nas dngos grub chen po ni rdo rje 'chang chen po phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs skye ba ni de las 'byung ba'o //
translated: The field is the fourth intimate instruction, and the great power is the arising of the form of Great Vajradhara, the Great Seal, from that.üîΩThe supreme is the attainment of the nature of the two truths inseparable.

original: mchog ni bden pa gnyis dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid can thob par 'gyur zhes pa ni rnyed par 'gyur ro zhes sems rnam par dag pa dang / bdag la byin gyis brlab pa dang / mngon par byang chub pa dang zung du 'jug pa'i rim pas bstan to //
analyzed: mchog ni bden pa gnyis dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid can thob par 'gyur zhes pa ni rnyed par 'gyur ro zhes sems rnam par dag pa dang / bdag la byin gyis brlab pa dang / mngon par byang chub pa dang zung du 'jug pa'i rim pas bstan to //
translated: The statement ‚Äúwill be found‚Äù teaches the stages of the pure mind, the self-consecration, the manifest enlightenment, and the union.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas gti mug gi rigs kyi dam tshig bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas gti mug gi rigs kyi dam tshig bstan par bya ste /
translated: Now, in order to teach the pledge of the family of delusion, it says ‚Äúthen‚Äù and so forth.

original: bzhi pa'i bdag nyid yin pas na bde ba chen po'o //
analyzed: bzhi pa'i bdag nyid yin pas na bde ba chen po'o //
translated: It is great bliss because it is the nature of the fourth.

original: tshogs gnyis dang ldan pas na dpal ldan no //
analyzed: tshogs gnyis dang ldan pas na dpal ldan no //
translated: It is glorious because it possesses the two stores.

original: ye shes ni gsum mo //
analyzed: ye shes ni gsum mo //
translated: The pristine awareness is the three.

original: thar ba ni 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: thar ba ni 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: Liberation is the clear light.

original: ye shes kyi sgo nas thar pa sgrub bar mdzad pas na ye shes thar pa rab tu bsgrub pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyi sgo nas thar pa sgrub bar mdzad pas na ye shes thar pa rab tu bsgrub pa'o //
translated: It is the establishment of liberation through pristine awareness.

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba la sogs pa rang bzhin brgya drug cu spang bar mdzad pas na rang bzhin gyis dag pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba la sogs pa rang bzhin brgya drug cu spang bar mdzad pas na rang bzhin gyis dag pa'o //
translated: Since it eliminates the one hundred and sixty natural impurities such as attachment, it is naturally pure.

original: glo bur gyi dri ma dang bral bas na gos med pa'o //
analyzed: glo bur gyi dri ma dang bral bas na gos med pa'o //
translated: Since it is free from adventitious stains, it is stainless.

original: byang chub gsum dang spyod pa gsum mo //
analyzed: byang chub gsum dang spyod pa gsum mo //
translated: [It is] the three enlightenments and the three practices.

original: byang chub @12b kyi phyir spyod pa ni byang chub spyod pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub @12b kyi phyir spyod pa ni byang chub spyod pa ste /
translated: The practice for the sake of enlightenment is the practice of enlightenment.

original: de rnams ston par mdzad pas na byang chub spyod pa rab bsgrub pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams ston par mdzad pas na byang chub spyod pa rab bsgrub pa'o //
translated: Since it teaches those, it is the accomplishment of the practice of enlightenment.

original: gdul dka' thams cad 'dul bar mdzad pas na 'od chen po ste lag na rdo rje'o //
analyzed: gdul dka' thams cad 'dul bar mdzad pas na 'od chen po ste lag na rdo rje'o //
translated: Since it tames all the difficult to tame, it is the great light, VajrapƒÅ·πái.

original: bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa thams cad kyi gtso bo ni dbang mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa thams cad kyi gtso bo ni dbang mdzad pa'o //
translated: The lord of all the action tantras and so forth is the lord.

original: bos nas ni mngon du byas nas so //
analyzed: bos nas ni mngon du byas nas so //
translated: Having called out, having made manifest,

original: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis zhes pa ni /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis zhes pa ni /
translated: the perfect buddha,

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob par byed pas so //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob par byed pas so //
translated: the one who causes the attainment of the state of Great Vajradhara,üîΩthe pledge reality,

original: dam tshig de nyid ces pa ni gti mug gi rigs kyi sdom pa gsungs so //
analyzed: dam tshig de nyid ces pa ni gti mug gi rigs kyi sdom pa gsungs so //
translated: the vow of the family of delusion, is taught.

original: rin chen chos zhes ba ni rim pa gnyis pa las thob par bya ba'i 'od gsal ba'o //üîΩde la sngags dang phyag rgya'i rim pas rab tu 'jug nas slar yang 'chang ba'i phyogs mchog spong ba'i phyir cig car ram snang ba nye bar thob pa la sogs pa'i rim pas snang ba thams cad mchog dang ldan pa rang gi bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'
analyzed: rin chen chos zhes ba ni rim pa gnyis pa las thob par bya ba'i 'od gsal ba'o // de la sngags dang phyag rgya'i rim pas rab tu 'jug nas slar yang 'chang ba'i phyogs mchog spong ba'i phyir cig car ram snang ba nye bar thob pa la sogs pa'i rim pas snang ba thams cad mchog dang ldan pa rang gi bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'
translated: The jewel Dharma is the clear light that is to be attained from the second stage.

original: bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Having entered by the stage of mantra and seal, one should meditate on the nature of Vajrasattva, endowed with all the supreme aspects, by the instantaneous or the stage of attaining light, and so forth, in order to abandon the supreme side of retention.üîΩBy that body,

original: lus de yis ni zhes pa la sgyu ma lta bu'i lus kyis rnam par smin pa 'phrog ba zhes pa ni dpal rdo rje 'chang gi sku gzung ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: lus de yis ni zhes pa la sgyu ma lta bu'i lus kyis rnam par smin pa 'phrog ba zhes pa ni dpal rdo rje 'chang gi sku gzung ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: the body that is like an illusion, one should steal the maturation, which is the attainment of the body of glorious Vajradhara.

original: rdzogs pa'i byang chub rab bsgrub pa'i //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i byang chub rab bsgrub pa'i //
translated: That is the supreme attainment of perfect enlightenment.

original: zhes pa ni rim pa bzhi pa myong ba sngon du 'gro ba'i mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi mtshan nyid rdo rje 'chang gi sku rdzogs par byed pa de ni rdzas rnams thams cad mchog gi ngo bo thob pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rim pa bzhi pa myong ba sngon du 'gro ba'i mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi mtshan nyid rdo rje 'chang gi sku rdzogs par byed pa de ni rdzas rnams thams cad mchog gi ngo bo thob pa'o //
translated: This is the characteristic of the realm of non-abiding nirvana, which is preceded by the experience of the fourth stage, and which perfects the body of Vajradhara, the nature of all substances.

original: ting nge 'dzin des bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par mdzad pas na yid bzhin nor bu dang 'dra ba rnal 'byor ba 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin des bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par mdzad pas na yid bzhin nor bu dang 'dra ba rnal 'byor ba 'gyur ro //
translated: The yogin becomes like a wish-fulfilling gem, since all wishes are fulfilled by that samadhi.

original: nam mkha'i mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'i nor gyi rgya mtshos rab tu 'gengs pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'i nor gyi rgya mtshos rab tu 'gengs pa'o //
translated: He is filled with the ocean of wealth, endowed with the sky-treasury samadhi.

original: 'di ni gti mug rigs dag gi //üîΩzhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs kyi'o //üîΩdam tshig de nyid yin par bsgrags //
analyzed: 'di ni gti mug rigs dag gi // zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs kyi'o // dam tshig de nyid yin par bsgrags //
translated: This is for those of the family of delusion.üîΩThis is for those of the family of Vairochana.üîΩThat is proclaimed to be the reality of the commitments.

original: zhes pa ni sdom pa'i nges pa'i don bshad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni sdom pa'i nges pa'i don bshad pa'o //
translated: This explains the definitive meaning of the vows.

original: des ni sems rnam par dag pa dang bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa dang / mngon par byang chub pa dang / zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa rnams bstan to //
analyzed: des ni sems rnam par dag pa dang bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa dang / mngon par byang chub pa dang / zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa rnams bstan to //
translated: This teaches the stages of the mind of purification, the consecration of oneself, the manifest enlightenment, and the union.

original: dpag med ces pa la sogs pas 'dod chags kyi rigs kyi dam tshig bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: dpag med ces pa la sogs pas 'dod chags kyi rigs kyi dam tshig bstan par bya ste /
translated: The pledge of the passion family is stated by immeasurable, etc.

original: bskal ba'am bskal pa stong gi bar du brtan par bzhugs pas na tshe dpag med ni tshe dpag tu med pa ste 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
analyzed: bskal ba'am bskal pa stong gi bar du brtan par bzhugs pas na tshe dpag med ni tshe dpag tu med pa ste 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
translated: Since he abides for an eon or a thousand eons, AmitƒÅyus is the immeasurable life, the immeasurable light.

original: sgyu ma'i sku ni ye shes kyi sku'o//üîΩ@13a * // der ni sgyu ma'i sku de la phung po la sogs dgang zhes pa ni tha mal pa'i lus la sogs pa 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i sku ni ye shes kyi sku'o// @13a * // der ni sgyu ma'i sku de la phung po la sogs dgang zhes pa ni tha mal pa'i lus la sogs pa 'jug par bya'o //
translated: The illusory body is the gnosis body.üîΩThere, one should enter the aggregates, etc., into that illusory body means one should enter the ordinary body, etc.

original: sgyu ma lta bu nyid spang bar bya ba'i phyir yang //üîΩshes dang pha rol phyin ldan pa'i //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu nyid spang bar bya ba'i phyir yang //üîΩshes dang pha rol phyin ldan pa'i //
translated: In order to abandon the very illusion, one should enter the aggregates, etc., into the illusory body means one should enter the ordinary body, etc.üîΩOne should enter the aggregates, etc., into the illusory body means one should enter the ordinary body, etc.üîΩIn order to abandon the very illusion, one should enter the aggregates, etc., into the illusory body means one should enter the ordinary body, etc.üîΩOne should enter the aggregates, etc., into the illusory body means one should enter the ordinary body, etc.

original: zhes pa ni ril por 'dzin pa dang rjes su 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin dag gis stong par gyur pa'i phung po la sogs pa zhes pa ni sgyu ma'i lus la gnas pa'i gzugs la sogs pa der bya ba ni mi snang bar bya'o //üîΩstong pa dang shin tu stong pa dang stong pa chen po dang thams cad stong pa ste stong pa bzhi'o //üîΩmnyam sbyor ba'i zhes pa ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rim pa'i 'brel pas so //üîΩbyang chub kyi ni tshul mchog ces pa ni phyi dang nang gi mngon par byang chub pa ni bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni ril por 'dzin pa dang rjes su 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin dag gis stong par gyur pa'i phung po la sogs pa zhes pa ni sgyu ma'i lus la gnas pa'i gzugs la sogs pa der bya ba ni mi snang bar bya'o // stong pa dang shin tu stong pa dang stong pa chen po dang thams cad stong pa ste stong pa bzhi'o // mnyam sbyor ba'i zhes pa ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rim pa'i 'brel pas so // byang chub kyi ni tshul mchog ces pa ni phyi dang nang gi mngon par byang chub pa ni bsgom par bya'o //
translated: This is the emptiness of the aggregates, etc. , which have become empty by means of the samƒÅdhis of grasping the whole and of subsequent grasping. There, in the form, etc. , of the magical body, one should perform the action of invisibility.üîΩThe four emptinesses are emptiness, great emptiness, supreme emptiness, and universal emptiness.üîΩThe union is by the relation of cause and effect.üîΩThe supreme method of enlightenment is the outer and inner manifest enlightenment, which is to be cultivated.üîΩ

original: des na man ngag bzhi thob nas 'gro ba'i don bya ba'i phyir dang kun rdzob ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /üîΩkun rdzob dang don dam pa'i rang bzhin dbang po gnyis dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi sbyor bas so //
